titleStmt.title: The youngmans guide in his way to heaven: or, A cabinet of rich jewels, left and bequeathed to all young persons by the reverend Mr. John Shrenock. B.D. Who dyed in the flower of his age, lying but seven days on his death bed; during which space of time, he wrought this sermon: desiring it might be preached at his funeral, and published for the benefit of all persons both young and old. With his last prayers. Licensed and entred according to order.
titleStmt.author: Shrenock, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers at the Black Raven in Hol..,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: title page cropped affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
